title: AirKeys
proj_desc: A proof-of-concept, projection-based virtual keyboard utilizing Computer Vision to detect and transmit user input to multiple devices. Unfinished.

title: Traveling Salesman Problem w/ AI
img_desc: A car traveling from one point to another.
proj_desc: A solution to the classic Traveling Salesman Problem using the Ant Swarm Optimization Algorithm. Includes in-depth analysis of design and test runs.

title: ASCII Bird
proj_desc: A 'Flappy Bird'-like game written in 32-bit MASM Assembly using text-based graphics.

title: Activity Calendar
proj_desc: A database-like application that features commanding for activity (data) insertion, lookup, and visualization using the Skip List data structure .

title: My Portfolio Website
proj_desc: A database-like application that features commanding for data insertion, lookup, and visualization.
